hero.title: Welcome to
hero.description: Experience the most immersive GTA V FiveM roleplay server. Join thousands of players in Los Santos for realistic roleplay, unique jobs, and unforgettable stories.

features.title: Why Choose Prime EGA Roleplay?
features.subtitle: Experience the best features in FiveM roleplay

activeCommunity.title: Active Community
activeCommunity.description: Join 500+ active players daily in immersive roleplay scenarios

professionalStaff.title: Professional Staff
professionalStaff.description: Experienced admins and moderators ensure fair and fun gameplay

customVehicles.title: Custom Vehicles
customVehicles.description: Drive unique cars, motorcycles, and aircraft with custom handling

housingSystem.title: Housing System
housingSystem.description: Buy, sell, and customize your dream home in Los Santos

uniqueJobs.title: Unique Jobs
uniqueJobs.description: From legal careers to criminal enterprises, find your path

realisticEconomy.title: Realistic Economy
realisticEconomy.description: Dynamic economy system with realistic prices and opportunities

server.title: Server Information
server.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Prime EGA Roleplay

join.title: Ready to Join?
join.description: Connect to our server and start your roleplay adventure today!

legalFactions.title: Legal Factions
legalFactions.subtitle: Serve and protect Los Santos with honor

government.title: Government
government.description: Lead the city with integrity and vision. Shape policies, manage budgets, and ensure the prosperity of Los Santos through effective governance and public service.

embassy.title: Embassy
embassy.description: Represent international interests and facilitate diplomatic relations. Handle visa applications, protect foreign nationals, and maintain peace between nations.

doj.title: Department of Justice
doj.description: Uphold the law through fair prosecution and defense. Serve as judges, prosecutors, and public defenders to ensure justice prevails in Los Santos.

lspd.title: LSPD Police
lspd.description: Protect and serve the citizens of Los Santos. Patrol the streets, investigate crimes, and maintain law and order in the city's urban areas.

sheriff.title: Sheriff Department
sheriff.description: Guard the county and rural areas with dedication. Patrol highways, respond to emergencies, and keep the outskirts of Los Santos safe.

ambulanceCity.title: Ambulance City
ambulanceCity.description: Save lives in the heart of Los Santos. Respond to medical emergencies, provide critical care, and transport patients to safety in urban environments.

ambulanceNorth.title: Ambulance North Side
ambulanceNorth.description: Deliver emergency medical services to the northern regions. Cover rural areas and provide life-saving care where it's needed most.

ambulanceCayo.title: Ambulance Cayo Perico
ambulanceCayo.description: Provide medical assistance on the tropical island paradise. Handle unique island emergencies and ensure the safety of all visitors and residents.

journalist.title: Journalist / News Agency
journalist.description: Report the truth and keep citizens informed. Investigate stories, conduct interviews, and broadcast breaking news across Los Santos.

availableJobs.title: Available Jobs
availableJobs.subtitle: Choose your career path in Los Santos

wigwam.title: Wigwam / BurgerShot
wigwam.description: Serve the best burgers in town and keep the citizens fed.

catCoffee.title: Cat Coffee
catCoffee.description: A relaxing atmosphere with coffee, pastries, and cute cats.

pearls.title: Pearls Restaurant
pearls.description: Fine dining seafood experience for the elite of Los Santos.

mechanic.title: Mechanic
mechanic.description: Repair, tune, and customize vehicles to perfection.

bikersMecano.title: Bikers Mecano
bikersMecano.description: Specialized repair shop for motorcycles and biker culture.

casino.title: Casino
casino.description: High stakes gambling, entertainment, and luxury.

nightclubLux.title: Nightclub – Lux
nightclubLux.description: The premier nightlife destination for parties and events.

nightclubUnicorn.title: Nightclub – Unicorn
nightclubUnicorn.description: Adult entertainment and exclusive bar services.

realEstate.title: Real Estate
realEstate.description: Buy, sell, and rent properties across the city.

lostMcBar.title: Lost MC Bar
lostMcBar.description: The hangout spot for the Lost MC and their allies.

gasStation.title: Gas Station Ownership
gasStation.description: Manage fuel supplies and run your own convenience store.

store.title: Store Ownership
store.description: Own and operate retail stores throughout the city.

factories.title: Factories Ownership
factories.description: Manage industrial production and manufacturing lines.

fishing.title: Fishing
fishing.description: Catch fresh fish from the ocean and sell for profit.

hunting.title: Hunting
hunting.description: Track and hunt wildlife in the wilderness.

trucker.title: Trucker Job
trucker.description: Transport goods and cargo across the state.

delivery.title: Delivery Job
delivery.description: Deliver packages and parcels to customers on time.

taxi.title: Taxi Job
taxi.description: Transport passengers to their destinations safely.

mining.title: Mining Job
mining.description: Extract valuable resources and minerals from the earth.

tow.title: Tow/Recovery Job
tow.description: Recover stranded or illegally parked vehicles.

farmer.title: Farmer Job
farmer.description: Cultivate crops and manage livestock on the farm.

membershipPricing.title: Membership Tiers
membershipPricing.subtitle: Choose your membership level and unlock exclusive benefits
